title: Lesson 9: Fighting for Purity
description: Life Skill: Honoring God with our bodies and minds.

blocks.text: Our bodies and minds are temples of the Holy Spirit. Pursuing personal purity is an intentional daily act of honoring God, protecting our relationships, and dwelling in His holiness.
Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, whom you have from God? You are not your own, for you were bought with a price. So glorify God in your body.
